ops.description:
showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:106}); // {Barret}
Our target's the {CYAN}Sector 5 Reactor{WHITE}.
Head for the station first.{PAUSE}I'll fill you in on the train.

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:111}); // {Barret}
Yo! {Cloud}!{PAUSE}Before the next mission,
I got somethin' I wanna ask you!{PAUSE}I, uh
I don't really know how to use Materia!{PAUSE}I'll give you that Materia we found.
Just teach me how to use it!

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:114}); // {Barret}
&$*#! What's this,
'It wasn't that tough!' crap?{PAUSE}I don't get it!.{PAUSE}You just handle the Materia, {Cloud}!

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:113}); // {Barret}
So this is what makes them guys
in SOLDIER so great, huh!?{PAUSE}Ok. I'll ask Jessie again later.
But you're in charge of the Materia!

showWindowWithDialog({window:3, dialog:116}); // [Materia System]
Access the menu
and select {PURPLE}[Materia]{WHITE} to equip Materia.

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:68}); // {Barret}
There's your money.
Now get the hell out!!

showWindowWithDialog({window:3, dialog:17}); // {Barret}
Get in here, fools!!
We're startin' the meetin'!!
climbLadder({x:-53, y:271, z:25, triangleId:92, advanceKey:Key.Up, animationId:18, facingDirection:128, speed:1});

showWindowWithDialog({window:3, dialog:96}); // {Barret}
Wait a sec big-time SOLDIER!

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:108}); // {Barret}
Whoa, wait a damn minute.
{Cloud}!!

showWindowWithDialog({window:3, dialog:103}); // {Barret}
Uh.ugh.
(That money's for Marlene's schoolin'.)

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:3}); // Welcome home, {Cloud}.
Looks like everything went well.

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:5}); // I should have known.{PAUSE}He's always pushing people around,
and you've always been in fights
ever since you were little.{PAUSE}I was worried.

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:6}); // Hmm.
You've grown up.{PAUSE}When you were little you used to get into
fights at the drop of a hat.

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:110}); // {Tifa}
I'm so glad everyone's safe.

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:8}); // {Tifa}
Flowers?
How nice{PAUSE}You almost never see them
here in the slums.

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:9}); // {Tifa}
But{PAUSE}A flower for me?
Oh {Cloud}, you shouldn't have

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:11}); // {Tifa}
Thank you, {Cloud}.
It smells wonderful.

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:12}); // Maybe I should fill the store
with flowers.

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:115}); // {Tifa}
{Cloud}! I got a message
from the Weapon Shop man upstairs.{PAUSE}He has something he wants to give you.
Don't forget!

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:61}); // {Tifa}
Marlene,
you watch the store while we're gone!

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:30}); // {Tifa}
OHH!!{PAUSE}I can make a drink just
as good as anyone else.{PAUSE}Everyone says my drinks taste the best!

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:31}); // {Tifa}
Just a minute.
I'll make one for you.

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:32}); // {Tifa}
You know, I'm relieved you made it back
safely.

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:33}); // {Cloud}
What's with you all of a sudden?
That job wasn't even tough.

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:34}); // {Tifa}
I guess not{PAUSE}You were in SOLDIER.

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:35}); // {Tifa}
Make sure you get your pay
from {Barret}.

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:36}); // {Cloud}
Don't worry.
Once I get that money, I'm outta here.
climbLadder({x:-53, y:181, z:-127, triangleId:0, advanceKey:Key.Down, animationId:0, facingDirection:0, speed:1});

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:39}); // {Tifa}
No reason.
You just look a little tired I guess.

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:49}); // {Tifa}
Will you please come back?
Ah, wait. Please wait.{PAUSE}The president of Shinra
is going to read a statement.

showWindowWithDialog({window:3, dialog:46}); // President Shinra
The terrorist group called AVALANCHE
has claimed responsibility for today's bombing
of the No. 1 Mako Reactor.

showWindowWithDialog({window:3, dialog:47}); // It is also predicted
that they will continue with similar terrorist
activities in the future.

showWindowWithDialog({window:3, dialog:48}); // But I want the citizens of Midgar to be assured.{PAUSE}Shinra, Inc. has mobilized SOLDIER to protect
you from any violence and thereby

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:50}); // {Tifa}
The next time we'll be up againstSOLDIER.

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:53}); // {Tifa}
You came to tell me that?

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:54}); // {Tifa}
He's not a bad person.

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:55}); // {Tifa}
Don't worry.
I'll talk to him.

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:56}); // {Tifa}
Come on. Let's go below!
climbLadder({x:-31, y:152, z:0, triangleId:20, advanceKey:Key.Up, animationId:0, facingDirection:0, speed:1});

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:41}); // {Tifa}
Listen, {Cloud}. I'm asking you.
Please join us.

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:43}); // {Tifa}
The Planet is dying.
Slowly but surely, it's dying.{PAUSE}Someone has to do something.

showWindowWithDialog({window:3, dialog:86}); // {Tifa}
You're just going to walk right out
ignoring your childhood friend!?

showWindowWithDialog({window:3, dialog:88}); // {Tifa}
.You forgot the promise, too.

showWindowWithDialog({window:3, dialog:91}); // {Tifa}
Remember? {Cloud},
it was seven years ago

showWindowWithDialog({window:3, dialog:92}); // {Tifa}
You remember now, don't you?
Our promise?

showWindowWithDialog({window:3, dialog:94}); // {Tifa}
But you got your childhood dream, didn't you?
You joined SOLDIER.

showWindowWithDialog({window:3, dialog:95}); // {Tifa}
So come on!
You've got to keep your promise

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:102}); // {Tifa}
psst.
(We're really hurting for help, right?)

Come on. Let's go below!

{Cloud}.
It's painful.{PAUSE}Why is that?

You know, {Cloud}.
{Barret} says those things, but{PAUSE}We're really unstable right now.
If SOLDIER were to show up, they'd whoop us.

{Cloud} gave it to me.

showWindowWithDialog({window:3, dialog:26}); // Marlene
Thank you, {Cloud}.{PAUSE}We'll take care of you.

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:73}); // Biggs
Hic!!{PAUSE}Oh
don't tell {Barret} what I jus' said.

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:69}); // Biggs
Aaah!!
Nothin' like that first drink after a job.

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:72}); // What!? You tellin' me
you're too good to drink with me?{PAUSE}Don't act big-headed jus' because you were
in SOLDIER!

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:71}); // Biggs
Oh!!
That's more like it!!{PAUSE}Even if you were with SOLDIER,
you're still a rookie here.
So you'd better listen to whatever I tell ya!

you're getting all excited.{PAUSE}Stop making such a mess!
